IdentityCenterApplicationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that the IAM Identity Center assigned to the monitor when it was created.

MonitorId.description: The unique identifier for the monitor.

Url.description: The complete URL of the monitor. The full URL of the monitor is subdomain.Region.deadlinecloud.amazonaws.com.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor.

description: Creates an AWS Deadline Cloud monitor that you can use to view your farms, queues, and fleets. After you submit a job, you can track the progress of the tasks and steps that make up the job, and then download the job's results.

DisplayName.description:
The name of the monitor that displays on the Deadline Cloud console.

> This field can store any content. Escape or encode this content before displaying it on a webpage or any other system that might interpret the content of this field.

IdentityCenterInstanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM Identity Center instance responsible for authenticating monitor users.

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role for the monitor. Users of the monitor use this role to access Deadline Cloud resources.

Subdomain.description: The subdomain used for the monitor URL. The full URL of the monitor is subdomain.Region.deadlinecloud.amazonaws.com.
